attributes.action: No To A Second Referendum On Brexit.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK people voted over Brexit, a second referendum must be opposed by all those who care about the future of democracy.

https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/politics/eu_referendum/results

https://theconversation.com/the-case-for-and-against-a-second-brexit-referendum-four-experts-give-their-views-90142
attributes.background: On 26th June 2016 the UK voted to leave the EU by 52% to 48%. To hold a second referendum would break down the very basis of democracy whilst undermining all political decisions for the foreseeable future. It would lead to public resentment and an increase in extremism.
